availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Oscar J. Somes (McCracken County, Kentucky, bank teller and capt 3rd Ky Inf (C.S.A))

body.p: McCracken County, Kentucky, bank teller and soldier. Massachusetts native. Clerk in Exeter, New Hampshire, in 1850. Bank teller in McCracken County, Kentucky, in 1860. Served in the 3rd Kentucky Infantry Regiment (C.S.A.) as captain from July 5, 1861, to June 16, 1862.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, New Hampshire, Rockingham County, Exeter, p. 204A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, McCracken County, Paducah, p. 909.
Compiled Service Records of Confederate Soldiers who Served in Organizations from the State of Kentucky, NARA RG 109, Microfilm Series M319, Roll 0066.
